osvSchema.summary: addthis/stream-lib: Implicit narrowing conversion in compound assignment
osvSchema.details:
addthis/stream-lib: Implicit narrowing conversion in compound assignment

Compound assignment statements (for example 'intvar += longvar') that implicitly cast a value of a wider type to a narrower type may result in information loss and numeric errors such as overflows.
This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in addthis/stream-lib version v2.9.3 by commit e53293d4dd660ca69d2ef5017cadc3842752cf60. For more details please see the references link.
